param.name: pbData
param.para: Pointer to a buffer that receives the password. To find the required buffer size, set this parameter to NULL. If fEncryptData is FALSE, the buffer contains a wide-character string. Otherwise, the buffer contains encrypted data.

param.name: pcbData
param.para: On input, specifies the size of the pbData buffer, in bytes. On output, receives the required buffer size. If fEncryptData is FALSE, the size includes the terminating null character.

param.name: fEncryptData
param.para: If TRUE, the method returns an encrypted string. Otherwise, the method returns an unencrypted string.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

remarks.para: If the password is not available, the method might succeed and set *pcbData to zero.

param.name: pbData
param.para: Pointer to a buffer that receives the user name. To find the required buffer size, set this parameter to NULL. If fEncryptData is FALSE, the buffer contains a wide-character string. Otherwise, the buffer contains encrypted data.

param.name: pcbData
param.para: On input, specifies the size of the pbData buffer, in bytes. On output, receives the required buffer size. If fEncryptData is FALSE, the size includes the terminating null character.

param.name: fEncryptData
param.para: If TRUE, the method returns an encrypted string. Otherwise, the method returns an unencrypted string.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

remarks.para: If the user name is not available, the method might succeed and set *pcbData to zero.

summary.para: Queries whether logged-on credentials should be used.

param.name: pfLoggedOnUser
param.para: Receives a Boolean value. If logged-on credentials should be used, the value is TRUE. Otherwise, the value is FALSE.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

param.name: pbData
param.para: Pointer to a buffer that contains the password. If fDataIsEncrypted is FALSE, the buffer is a wide-character string. Otherwise, the buffer contains encrypted data.

param.name: cbData
param.para: Size of pbData, in bytes. If fDataIsEncrypted is FALSE, the size includes the terminating null character.

param.name: fDataIsEncrypted
param.para: If TRUE, the password is encrypted. Otherwise, the password is not encrypted.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

param.name: pbData
param.para: Pointer to a buffer that contains the user name. If fDataIsEncrypted is FALSE, the buffer is a wide-character string. Otherwise, the buffer contains encrypted data.

param.name: cbData
param.para: Size of pbData, in bytes. If fDataIsEncrypted is FALSE, the size includes the terminating null character.

param.name: fDataIsEncrypted
param.para: If TRUE, the user name is encrypted. Otherwise, the user name is not encrypted.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

summary.para: Sets and retrieves user-name and password information for authentication purposes.
